scripts.start: gnome-terminal -- roscore & rosrun web_video_server web_video_server & nodejs talker.js & rosbag play -l -q ./public/Plugins/test_ros_subscriber/test_bag.bag & electron .
scripts.launch-test: gnome-terminal -- roscore && gnome-terminal -- nodejs talker.js && gnome-terminal -- electron .
scripts.launch-test-2: gnome-terminal -- roscore & rosrun web_video_server web_video_server & nodejs talker.js & rosbag play -l -q ./public/Plugins/test_ros_subscriber/test_bag.bag & electron .
scripts.gui: npm run electron & rosrun web_video_server web_video_server & roslaunch rosbridge_server rosbridge_websocket.launch
scripts.initialize: npm install && sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-rosbridge-suite  && sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-web-video-server
scripts.initialize16: npm install && sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-rosbridge-suite  && sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-web-video-server
